entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
